title: ‘The Great British Baking Show’ Season 13, Episode 3: “Bread Week” | Everything Is Cake
description:
Kate and Amelia discuss a controversial week of bread baking in the tent with two contestants missing due to sickness. They dig into the best and worst aspects of the pizza signature, pain aux raisins technical, and a truly bizarre smorgastorte showstopper, before handing out some awards.
Hosts: Kate Halliwell and Amelia Wedemeyer
Producer: Sasha Ashall
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
